scripts.db:migrate: wrangler d1 execute zennote-d1 --remote --file=./migrations/001_init.sql && wrangler d1 execute zennote-d1 --remote --file=./migrations/002_add_auth.sql
scripts.db:migrate:local: wrangler d1 execute zennote-d1 --local --file=./migrations/001_init.sql && wrangler d1 execute zennote-d1 --local --file=./migrations/002_add_auth.sql
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:create && npm run db:migrate
